name: uhgrfun

stmt.origin: ffund(c1, cdm(c1), cdif(cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), csn(emptycls)), wcel(c0, cuhgr))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wfun(c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), cdif(cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), csn(emptycls))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wfun(c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), cdif(cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), csn(emptycls))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), cdif(cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), csn(emptycls))))
-| wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), cfv(cvtx, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ciedg, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ UHGraph →(c1 : dom(c1)→(P((Vtx ` c0))\ { ∅ })))
⊣ (Vtx ` c0)=(Vtx ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(iEdg ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wfun(c1))
-| wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), cfv(cvtx, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ciedg, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ UHGraph → Fun(c1))
⊣ (Vtx ` c0)=(Vtx ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(iEdg ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wfun(c1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ciedg, c0))

comment: The edge function of an undirected hypergraph is a function. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-Dec-2017.) (Revised by AV, 15-Dec-2020.)
